doc.title: QShowDiff
doc.subtitle: QShowDiff is tool for visualisation of diffs generated from various VCS systems.

section.title: About
section.p: QShowDiff je jednoduchy nastroj na barevne zobrazovani diffu. QShowDiff vznikl, protoze mi zde chybel nastroj, ktery by delal jen tuhle jednu vec. Sice zde existuji programy jako je KDiff3 nebo Kompare, ale ty jsou prilis komplikovane na tak jednoduchou vec jako je prohlizeni si diffu.

QShowDiff is simple tool for colourful visualisation of diffs. QShowDiff was created because I was missing some tool which would do only this one thing. It's true that there are programs such as KDiff3 or Kompare, however these programs are too complicated for a task as simple as viewing diffs.

QShowDiff dela jen jednu vec a to je zobrazovani diffu. Neporovnava soubory ani adresare - od toho zde existuje mnoho nastroju, ktere to dokazi, a ktere to rozhodne delaji dobre. Proto take QShowDiff vznikl. Potreboval jsem program, ktery bude delat jenom tu jednu vec a to je zobrazovani barevneho diffu. Nic vic nic min.

QShowDiff does only one thing and that is a visualisation of diff. It does not compare two files or directories - for that there are many tools that surely do the task very well. And that is the reason why QShowDiff was created. I needed a program which will do only one thing - colorful visualisation of diffs. Nothing more and nothing less.

Dalsi duvod proc vznikl je ten, ze by bylo fajn mit jeden nastroj pro zobrazeni diffu barevne, at se pouziva jakykoli verzovaci system. Tudiz jsem chtel QShowDiff naimplementovat tak, aby slo jednoduse pridavat podporu pro ruzne verzovaci systemy. Snad se mi to povedlo.

Another reason for creating this program is that it would be nice to have only one tool for visualisation of diff from any version control system. So I wanted to implement QShowDiff to have simple interface for adding support for various version control systems. I hope it was answered.

section.title: Usage
section.p: QShowDiff prijima jeden argument, coz je typ verzovaciho systemu, ze ktereho je zobrazovany diff generovan. Diff, ktery se ma zobrazovat je cten ze standartniho vstupu.
QShowDiff takes only one argument, the type of VCS from which is visualised diff generated. Diff which has to be visualised is read from standart input.

subsection.title: Examples
subsection.p:
To show last changes in git repository
git diff | qshowdiff git

To genrate patch from svn and visualise them later
svn diff > changes.patch cat changes.patch | qshowdiff svn

section.title: Source Code
section.p:
Latest development source code can be obtained from git repository http://www.danfis.cz/git/qshowdiff.git.
git clone http://www.danfis.cz/git/qshowdiff.git
You can also always browse the current contents of git repository on web using gitweb or cgit.
Latest stable release can be downloaded from here: qshowdiff-0.3.tar.gz
